underlying_goal: Update all spec files in the spec/research-team/x-keyword/ directory according to a spec update plan and handover document
friction_detail: Claude's edit tool call failed or was incorrect on team.md, requiring a retry which the user then interrupted.
brief_summary: User (via team lead) asked Claude to update all x-keyword spec files per a plan, but the edit attempts failed and the user interrupted the session before any files were successfully updated.
